column5: Headhunter mentioned in another post that there may be a warming trend coming soon, so I checked it out.....  For those of us who are in denial about winter, this will keep you going for the next little bit!!!!!  This is for Toronto, but is similar for all of Southern Ontario.    WOO HOO!!!!  Maybe I can get out there and fish without having to knock ice off my rod!!!
i need snow, gotta get on the sled
i dont know ernie ,its not looking good right now you may have to wait for a while yet
Looks like the last three or four days of Muskie season looks promising!! Tinbanger...don't put the boat way yet!
